mapper.update: update ptndb_instpath set mointorType = #{mointorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mointorTypeDB = #{mointorTypeDb_bool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mointorTotalDB = #{isMointorTotal_bool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mointorCycle = #{miintorCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalSize = #{totalDbSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ptnDb_instPath_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
